summary.Title: Chef, Verdens Ende Spiseriet AS, May - October 2022, Tjøme, Norway
summary.JobHeadline: Chef, Verdens Ende Spiseriet AS, May - October 2022, Tjøme, Norway
summary.Presentation:
Verdens Ende Spiseriet AS, Tjøme, Norway, is looking for a chef.
Working periode is from May 23 to September 30, 2022.
Job description

Making a la carte

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Chef, Verdens Ende Spiseriet AS, May - October 2022, Tjøme, Norway
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Verdens Ende Spiseriet AS, Tjøme, Norway, is looking for a chef.

Working periode is from May 23 to September 30, 2022.

Job description

  • Making a la carte in our kitchen

Skills

  • Good commication skills in English language
  • Education as chef
  • Experience with cooking European food
  • Must be able too work in a kitchen with other nationalities and in a stressful environment.
  • Experience from a la carte is a must

Working hours

  • Shifts between 10 AM to 23.00 PM

Salary

  • 220 NOK per hour / 162 hour a month + tip money (aprox. 4000 NOK per month)

Apartment we have to your disposal.

More information

Remi Hallvig, +47 4685 1647, post@verdensendespiseriet.no

How to apply?

send your application to Remi Hallvig at post@verdensendespiseriet.no

Latest application date is May 15, 2022.

(from NAV EURES Norway)

 

Our restaurant is located in the county of Vestfold ( 100 km south from Oslo the capitol of Norway). The restaurant is located on the end island Tjøme, the place is called (“end of the world”) This spot is the most visited in area, 800 thousand people visits last year

We have a full service restaurant with 85 seats inside and 120 seats outside.

Our restaurant is popular and we have many regular guests.

We ar famous for our fishsoup and lobster soup. Everyday we are serving fresh fish catch of the day. 

All food is made from scratch.

In the summertime it`s many guest that is visiting us on daily basis, we are serving up too 800 dishes a day.

The restaurant has high score on Google / facebook and Tripadvisor

We have many nationalities in our crew, both young and middle aged people.

If you feel you are the right person and want too work in our team, please send us a message.

www.verdensendespiseriet.no
